channel.title: Lo-Fi Python - coding, programming, python, web2py, apps

item.title: Troubleshooting Tracebacks to Resurrect a Python Web2py App
item.description:
Back in 2016, I built a web2py app as my first web application. It accepts a prompt from the user and primitively attempts to match that text to a line of Kevin Parker's lyrics written for the band Tame Impala.

I didn't look at the app's code for many years â€¦
item.dc:creator: lofipython
